name: The Camp (JustWall)
description:
Try to Survive in this Permadeath Pixel World.

Make sure you eat.
Make sure you stay warm.
Watch out for exhaustion.

CONTROLS:

WASD = Player Movement
Arrow Keys = Look Direction
E = Action
F = Place Fire
G = Place Garden
T = Place Tent
Y = Place Snare
Q = Eat
C = Direction of Tent
V = Rest
X = Destroy Placed Object

Life is Short = Be Creative
